title: Huge sinkhole opens up outside Italian hospital, forcing evacuation of COVID-19 patients
content:
1. Huge sinkhole opens up outside Italian hospital, forcing evacuation of COVID-19 patients  WCVB Boston
  2. A huge sinkhole, 66 feet deep and 21,500 square feet wide, opens in parking lot of Italian hospital, disrupting COVID-19 care  USA TODAY
  3. Swallowed hole: Ground caves in horrific collapse  New York Daily News
  4. Cars swallowed by sinkhole outside Italy hospital  Yahoo News
  5. Drone footage shows huge sinkhole in Naples hospital car park  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
